home.text: I am a full-stack developer and content creator. I build web applications, websites, and automate processes. Beyond coding, I create various types of content – from professional advertising films and casual vlogs to gaming videos and promotional reels for businesses and brands. I love building something from nothing. Completing tasks that help grow a business while bringing joy is my main goal. I enjoy collaborating on innovative projects – if you have an idea, let’s make it happen together!
